short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Localhost Open Graph Debugger is a Chrome extension designed to check the Open Graph meta tags on locally hosted websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By temporarily hosting the meta tags on our site, it simplifies the process, allowing you to easily verify them without the need for tunneling tools like ngrok.
